title: "Washington State Partners with Amazon to Train, Certify High-Schoolers in Cloud Computing"
excerpt: "Washington public schools are partnering with Amazon Web Services in a statewide program to train and certify 2,500 high school students in cloud computing over the next three years, and the collaboration will include new course offerings across Washington state to train students in artificial intelligence,"
